name: lint
description: Runs linting tools on Angular app code in a given project folder.
longDescription:
Takes the name of the project, as specified in the  `projects` section of the `angular.json` workspace configuration file.
When a project name is not supplied, it will execute for all projects.

The default linting tool is [TSLint](https://palantir.github.io/tslint/), and the default configuration is specified in the project's `tslint.json` file.

**Note**: TSLint has been discontinued and support has been deprecated in the Angular CLI. The options shown below are for the deprecated TSLint builder.
To opt-in using the community driven ESLint builder, see [angular-eslint](https://github.com/angular-eslint/angular-eslint#migrating-from-codelyzer-and-tslint) README.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to lint.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: tslint-config
options.description: The name of the TSLint configuration file.

options.name: ts-config
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

options.name: fix
options.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

options.name: type-check
options.description: Controls the type check for linting.

options.name: force
options.description: Succeeds even if there was linting errors.

options.name: format
options.description: Output format (prose, json, stylish, verbose, pmd, msbuild, checkstyle, vso, fileslist).
